TopicTitle: Chief Rockety Designer Rateac takes control of the Kerbal Space Program

Articles.Content:
Welcome everyone, I am am Raetac and it is my dubious honor to present my video diary of my adventures sending the little balls of cuteness into space (and hopefully back again!). In the past I taught myself how to get craft into orbit, but now as we are learning science I think it is high time I try and push past that with the help of the Directors of the Kerbal Space Program and that is YOU the viewer!

The first flight has come back from the editor (Hurry up Raetac with the next two! Yes, yes.. I'm getting there...)

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=L12ACifF7Cw

So once the slave....erm I mean editor has finished with the footage of the next couple of flights, I'll be sure to present them to Directors for futhur analysis (Hopefully they might give me something more than a nod and a "That's fine Chief Designer..." )

Well looks like the reporter has been slack in bringing the updates (Good one Raetac ) so here we go..

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Tg33TGaVOw0

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DXk2fBQDrPE

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JaEDMp0nkBw

The editor made a mess of the title image of the following, should be recitfied soon..

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZQFk9u-zbcI

Once again I dont visit forums enough so here they are, still not getting it quite right...

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xxkkK_huPsM

with

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tg-lrcSnODQ

and

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ma0sE_QHKlk

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jqe3yk-sjy8

and I'm having fun with silly bamboo music loving people in the next vids so expect them soon...
